'Mutant Ape Planet' NFT Developer Pleaded Guilty in $3M Fraud https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/11/14/mutant-ape-planet-nft-developer-pleaded-guilty-in-3m-fraud/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines R5NQXKCJCBBN3HWAJ7OFJNN7NM Jesse HamiltonThe developer behind the Mutant Ape Planet non-fungible token (NFT) collection – a knockoff of the Mutant Ape Yacht Club NFTs – pleaded guilty on Tuesday to defrauding buyers in a rug pull that netted almost $3 million, according to the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ).
